featured.text: She said they were married on May 26, while my dad’s memory told him it was June 25.
Mom and Dad are coming here for a weekend next month.
Dad certainly had the list 33 when he left for the market, but he would somehow forget it, and then would find it again only after he returned home.
Mom seldom asked Dad to go shopping in the traditional market for her.

other.text: But whenever Dad 32 on going, she made sure that he brought a shopping list.
The reason was 38 : Dad would not remember any of it, we thought.

definition.example: My dad takes me to the park every weekend.
